content: showcase the beautiful colors of lion brand mandala yarn with this simple pillow single_crochet stitches in the back loop only create beautiful corduroy-like texture luscious fringe makes closing the sides of the pillow a breeze cover an old 12 by 16 inch pillow 30 by 40 cm to give it new life or buy the elevation pillow kit including the yarn pillow form and printed pattern from my shop at www prettypeaceful com crochet along with the video tutorial on youtube https //youtu be/vs2licgqwag finished size 12 by 16 30 by 40 cm yarn dk weight 590 yards 540 m the sample pillow used one cake of lion brand mandala 100% acrylic yarn in the lochness colorway 590 yards/540 m per 150-gram cake purchase the kit including the yarn pillow form and printed pattern at www prettypeaceful com pillow form required 12 by 16 30 by 40 cm hook 2 75 mm us c requires chain and single_crochet stitches in us terms pattern notes the pillow is all single_crochet stitches in the back loop only in us terms the yarn is cut after each row and new yarn is joined to begin the next row a 6 15 cm yarn tail at the start and end of each row create fringe that is knotted to close the sides of the pillow please feel free to sell finished items made from this pattern and give design credit as elevation pillow crochet pattern by pretty peaceful not for commercial use please do not share photos of this pattern only share the link to the pattern pdf on ravelry or youtube thank you for your support
